content:
**size ** 19 inches 48 3 cm in diameter
**materials ** j & p coats or clark s o n t best six cord mercerized crochet size 20 small ball j & p coats - 3 balls of white or ecru or clark s o n t - 5 balls of white or ecru **or** big ball j & p coats - 2 balls of white or ecru steel crochet hook no 8 or 9
